channel.title: Some weird Devolution glitch or bug
channel.description: Whenever i use [code]plrText = "";[/code] it keeps spamming it everytime i move instead of just staying it once. How can I fix this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 04, 2008, 04:26:51 pm[/size][hr]I love how no one helps me...
